articles.description: The two unscripted shows finish first and second in both adults 18-49 and total viewers.
articles.content:
The Masked Singer and Survivor each claimed a piece of Wednesday's crown. The former topped the night among adults 18-49, and Survivor gathered the most total viewers. 
The Masked Singer's 2.0 rating among adults 18-49 and 7.88 million viewers was on par wit… [+1240 chars]

articles.title: Watch the trailer for Jerry Seinfeld’s first original comedy special in 22 years - Polygon
articles.description: In 23 Hours to Kill, Jerry Seinfeld returns to stand-up, releasing his first original comedy special in 22 years. The special’s release date on Netflix is May 5.
articles.content: 23 Hours to Kill hits Netflix on May 5

articles.title: Jussie Smollett update: Former 'Empire' actor's lawsuit against Chicago dismissed by federal judge - WLS-TV
articles.description: Jussie Smollett's counter lawsuit against the city of Chicago was thrown out by a federal judge Wednesday.
articles.content:
CHICAGO (WLS) -- Jussie Smollett's counter lawsuit against the city of Chicago was thrown out by a federal judge Wednesday.The judge said Smollett's claim cannot move forward until the first lawsuit is handled.
